channel.title: financial analysis on Digital Forays
channel.description: Recent content in financial analysis on Digital Forays

item.title: Bitcoin vs. the DOW and NASDAQ
item.description: So there’s been a lot of talk lately about Microstrategy’s seemingly almost constant buys of Bitcoin. There’s also been quite a lot of chatter recently about some other hardware companies, (Marvel Technologies, MARA, etc.) getting involved. We also have things like “Coinbase” that is frequently linked to Bitcoin as well. I thought I would do some coding to see how correlated these stock tickers are with Bitcoin. But before that I wrote some code to see how correlated the Dow Jones and NASDAQ were with BTC-USD.
